Prev: City View Up: Park Güell Next: Terrace bench detail

Terrace Cross



This is from the large terrace in the center of the park, surrounded by benches where many people sit in small groups.
The tower with the cross is on the top of the gift shop at the base of the park.
Taken Tuesday, September 11, 2001, 11:43:36am.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 906kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/200s @ F7.0, ISO 100, 166mm
PS6 Curves 0:0 - 100:90 - 225:255, B 10:0 - 255:255, USM 20:100 - 20:20 - 70:0.5
